name: Main Levels Editor
description: customizable thing to change main levels uknowya

REMOVE_UI.name: Remove control UI
REMOVE_UI.description: Remove buttons and other stuff made to control things in game.

VERIFY_LEVEL_INTEGRITY.name: Verify level integrity
VERIFY_LEVEL_INTEGRITY.description:
Disable this to bring back level int verification for some reason...

(if verify fails, it will show "Load Failed!" on level load)

REPLACE_DIFFICULTY_SPRITE.name: Replace difficulty sprite
REPLACE_DIFFICULTY_SPRITE.description:
Replace the difficulty sprite with a `
diffIcon_{level_difficulty:02d}_btn_001.png frame or file`

TYPE_AND_ID_HACKS_FOR_SECRET_COINS.name: Type and ID hacks for Secret Coins
TYPE_AND_ID_HACKS_FOR_SECRET_COINS.description:
Hack around type and id of Secret Coin objects to bypass some game anti-cheat logic. Baasicly aims to force game add them to level as User Coins.

Use [Unlisted Objects in Editor](mod:legowiifun.unlisted_objects_in_editor) mod by [legowiifun](https://geode-sdk.org/developers/122) to add Secret Coins to Create Tab in Level Editor.

LEVELS_LISTING.name: Levels Listing
LEVELS_LISTING.description:
# IDs set for level select page.

## Format: 
<cy> - Single ID</c>: -1 (shows one level)
<co> - Sequence</c>: 1:23 (levels from 1 to 23)
<cr>Use commas to separate entries!</c>

## Example: 
`"`<cy>`1337`</c>`,`<co>`1:22`</c>`,`<cy>`-1`</c>,<cy>`-2`</c>`"` will list level <cy>`1337`</c>, levels <co>`1` through `22`</c>, then <cy>`-1`</c> and <cy>`-2`</c>.
<cr>
```
-1 is coming soon page, and -2, the tower.
```
</c>
